item.title: Projects
item.description: These are references to publicly available online publications involving my work. The following portraits of people were created together with Katharina Hahn as moving clouds publishing: Sept. 2021: Cristobal Desforges / Pure Lines Surfboards (photos and translation) Sept. 2021: Nathaniel B. Cippele / Cool Beans Coffee Stop (photos and translation) Nov. 2021: Melissa Benedict / That Gather Girl (photos and translation) I worked on photo editing and English translation for the following article:

item.title: About Me
item.description: Hello, my name is Johannes. I created this page as a personal portfolio to showcase some of my photography and projects. Creative expression is an important part of me, with my photography I like to capture aesthetics of scenarios surrounding me in a non-arranged way. My favorite genres are photojournalism, documentary and street photography. I am a passionate person in general, active in outdoor sports like rock climbing and surfing, knowledgeable and curious about technology, programming and engineering of open source software.

item.title: Photography
item.description: This is some selected photography in several albums: Climbing Clouds Landscapes Streets Surfing

item.title: Climbing and Bouldering
item.description: Pictures of people rock climbing and bouldering, featured places are: Frankenjura, Ticino, Silvretta, Allg√§u, Pfalz and others. Enjoy it here or view this album on flickr.
